Articles.Content: well Im just improving my military tech level ,and building schools right now.
It seems that stuff has hit the fan. Sorry for my inactivity, you need help?
Did a second exploration today and revealed some 900Mbbls. Oh yeah.
So far I almost getting to the next tier of tech ,and been fixing up QOL as it had lowered ,and my popularity.
Well being attacked by the african Union ,and I suffering loses on the front.
I messaged the attacker and his leader last night, and neither of them responded but you are now at peace.
At this rate we might have to cancel the MDP with them.
What do you mean "At this rate"? Only one guy attacked us and he stopped after I told him about the MDP.
Also we need as many MDPs as we can get. For protection.
Rumsod is absent and the game is falling apart again, so I think I might call it quits and go back to Kerbin.

Maybe we should play Politics and War. It's harder than >BLOC, though.

http://politicsandwar.com/

Sounds good. I've sent you a message to apply to join the United Kerbals. Also, here's the thread for the game:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/66941-Politics-and-War
well im back guys so what did i miss.

what did i miss.

Well, Rumsod has been absent since December and as result the world of >Bloc has gone to hell, but other than that not much. Since >Bloc is dying, we should probably move on to something else, such as Worlds At War. It's a space-themed game based off of >Bloc.
Hmm.. i joined politics ,and war ,but i want to see it now.
